movies.title: Barbie in the Nutcracker
movies.description: Barbie stars as Clara, who journeys into a magical world with the Nutcracker to defeat the evil Mouse King and restore peace to the Land of Sweets.

movies.title: Barbie as Rapunzel
movies.description: In this enchanting story, Barbie plays Rapunzel, a talented artist trapped in a tower who uses her creativity and courage to find her freedom.

movies.title: Barbie of Swan Lake
movies.description: Barbie portrays Odette, a young girl turned into a swan by an evil sorcerer’s curse. Only true love and bravery can restore her human form.

movies.title: Barbie as The Princess and the Pauper
movies.description: Barbie plays dual roles as Princess Anneliese and pauper Erika, two girls from different worlds who switch places to save the kingdom.

movies.title: Barbie: Fairytopia
movies.description: In the colorful world of Fairytopia, Barbie is Elina, a wingless fairy who proves that courage and kindness can create true magic.

movies.title: Barbie and the Diamond Castle
movies.description: Best friends Liana and Alexa discover a hidden diamond castle and the power of music to overcome evil and protect their friendship.

movies.title: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
movies.description: Barbie stars as Corinne, a courageous young woman from the countryside who dreams of becoming a Musketeer in Paris. Along with her three friends, she discovers that true strength comes from teamwork and bravery as they protect the prince and prove that girls can do anything.

movies.title: Barbie: Princess Charm School
movies.description: Blair, a kind-hearted girl, is chosen to attend Princess Charm School, where she learns what it truly means to be royal—kind, brave, and honest.

movies.title: Barbie: Princess Adventure
movies.description: Barbie and her friends travel to the kingdom of Floravia, where she learns about leadership, friendship, and being true to herself.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Living in the perfect world of Barbie Land, Barbie begins to question her reality and ventures into the real world on a journey of self-discovery.
